channel.title: chill-out on Modulandu
channel.description: Recent content in chill-out on Modulandu

item.title: Samba pro Paulinho is released
item.description: Modulandu · Samba pro Paulinho We’ve made this experimental beat with real Brazilian samba percussion mixed with a bunch of synths and the voice of Paulinho da Viola, one of the greatest samba artists alive. Samba pro Paulinho We are an independent duo from Brazil. We love experimenting with diverse genres and influences, and we are always looking forward to working with other artists. We need your help to continue doing this work.

item.title: Movimento is released
item.description: Modulandu · Movimento We are happy to release Movimento, a calm and introspective track featuring Lucas Jardim on the prepared piano and Fernando Figueira on the Guzheng (an ancient Chinese instrument). Movimento Hope you enjoy it. Keep in touch for news on releases. Subscribe to our blog and follow us on our channels.
